#summary Welcome to gTimeTrack project.
 
= Introduction =

gTimeTrack is a utility written in Java to import your calendars to a .csv file.
This way, you can download your data and export it to another database.

For example, you can save in Google Calendar the working hours you have dedicated to a project, and each month you can extract this information to know how mouch hours did you spend in this project.
